directions: In a bowl, beat cream cheese with an electric mixer until smooth.  Add two avocados, green chiles, Worcestershire sauce, garlic salt and pepper; beat until fairly smooth.

Gently mix in remaining avocado, leaving it a little chunky. Serve immediately or store in refrigerator covered with plastic wrap, pushing the wrap down so that it is touching the entire surface of the guacamole.
ingredients: 2 large ripe avocados, peeled and pitted
1 (4 ounce) can diced green chiles, drained
2 teaspoons Worcestershire sauce, or to taste
1 large ripe avocado, peeled and pitted
title: Tucson Guacamole
